Posts.Content: hello to all just to introduce myself. l'm 65 years old had breast cancer five years ago mx chemo herseptin rads. just had five year mamm all clear but lympnodes up had ultra sound and yes here are cancer cells present next week going for mri bone scan and a mri on the breast doctor said this is not right so fingers crossed it is in the breast even though mam was clear l've been hearing that mams do miss things anyone else been in this position vic
